info.name: FlowChain Product API
info.description: Collection for testing the Product API endpoints of the Instatenders Multi-tenant application

item.name: Authentication

exec: console.log('Token saved to environment variable: authToken');

request.description: Login to get the authentication token

item.description: Authentication endpoints to get token for API access

request.description: Get all products for the current tenant with pagination and filtering options
Get a single product by its ID

exec: console.log('Product ID saved to environment variable: productId');

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Cordless Drill Set",
    "brand": "PowerTech",
    "category": "Tools",
    "subCategory": "Power Tools",
    "categoryId": "{{childCategoryId}}",
    "categoryPath": ["Tools", "Power Tools"],
    "description": "Professional grade cordless drill with lithium-ion battery. Comes with carrying case and multiple drill bits.",
    "shortDescription": "18V cordless drill with accessories",
    "mrp": 12000,
    "discount": 15,
    "price": 10200,
    "inStock": true,
    "stockQuantity": 25,
    "isPopular": true,
    "partNumber": "PT-DRILL-18V",
    "sku": "DRILL-18V-PRO",
    "tags": ["drill", "power tool", "cordless", "professional", "18v"],
    "thumbnailUrl": "https://example.com/images/thumbnails/cordless-drill.jpg",
    "images": [
        "https://example.com/images/cordless-drill-1.jpg",
        "https://example.com/images/cordless-drill-2.jpg"
    ],
    "specifications": {
        "Power": "18V",
        "Chuck Size": "13mm",
        "Speed Settings": "2",
        "No-load Speed": "0-450/0-1500 RPM",
        "Max Torque": "50Nm",
        "Battery Type": "Lithium-ion",
        "Weight": "1.8kg",
        "Includes": "Carrying case, charger, 2 batteries, 10 drill bits",
        "Warranty": "2 years"
    },
    "ratings": {
        "average": 4.5,
        "count": 128
    }
}

exec: console.log('First product ID saved to environment variable: productId');
